All Classes

Class Description
ActionToken
ActionToken represents action tokens in single player games
ActionTokenDeck
ActionTokenDeck is the deck of ActionTokens in single player games
AdvanceOnceAndReshuffleToken
AdvanceOnceAndReshuffleToken is the action token that advances one position in the faith track and reshuffles the deck
AdvanceTwiceToken
AdvanceTwiceToken is the action token that advances two position in the faith track
BlueMarble
BlueMarble is the subclass for blue Marbles
Board
Board represents the board of each player It is a container of the classes which represents board's elements
CardColour
CardColour represents all possible cards' colours
CardLevel
CardLevel represents all possible cards' levels
CardLevelTest  
CardMarket
This class refers to the Card Market where you can buy the devCards.
CardMarketDeck
Deck of DevCards of the CardMarket
CardType  
CardTypeSet
CardTypeset represents a set of CardTypes
ChoiceResource
ChoiceResource represents a resource that can be spent or obtained, but the player has the choice to select such resource
ChoiceResourceSet
ChoiceResourceSet is a container for generic resources, including ChoiceResources
ChoiceResourceSetTest  
ChoiceResourceTest  
ChoiceSet
ChoiceSet represents a set of resources to choose from
ChoiceSetTest  
Computer  
ConcreteResource
ConcreteResource represents all possible in-game resources
ConcreteResourceLocation
ConcreteResourceLocation is the interface for resource locations that directly store resources
ConcreteResourceSet
ConcreteResourceSet is a container for ConcreteResources
ConcreteResourceSetTest  
ConcreteResourceTest  
ConversionEffect
ConversionEffect represents leaderCards' conversion power, which allows to convert a white marble into a ConcreteResource.

Depot
Depot is the class for warehouse depots
DepotLeaderCard
DepotLeaderCard represents all LeaderCards with a depot power.

DiscardBlueToken is the action token that discards two blue development cards from the CardMarket

DiscardPurpleToken is the action token that discards two purple development cards from the CardMarket
DiscardYellowToken

InvalidBoardException is thrown when an invalid Board is trying to get used

InvalidCardLevelException  
InvalidChoiceSetException
InvalidChoiceSetException is thrown when a null or empty ChoiceSet is trying to be used

InvalidDepotSizeException is thrown when a Depot with an invalid size is trying to get created

InvalidQuantityException is thrown when a not valid quantity is trying to get used

InvalidResourceException is thrown when a not valid resource is trying to get used

LeaderCard
LeaderCard refers to all the leader cards.
LeaderCardArea
The area of the board containing the leaderCards currently active.
LeaderCardDepot
A special depot created by the activation of a DepotLeaderCard, it can store just 2 resource of a defined type.

LeaderCardRequirements represents the requirements needed to play a LeaderCard

NotConcreteException
NotConcreteException is thrown when a ConcreteResource was expected
NotEnoughResourcesException
NotEnoughResourcesException is thrown when there are not enough resources to complete the action
NotSingleTypeException
NotSingleTypeException is thrown when a ConcreteResourceSet containing resources of at most one type was expected
ObtainableResourceSet
ObtainableResourceSet is a TransactionResourceSet where the resource set is going to be given to a player (board) This TransactionResourceSet includes faith points as they can be obtained

Resource
Resource is the interface for resources, including ChoiceResources
ResourceLocation
ResourceLocation is the interface for classes in the Board that contain resources
ResourceSet
ResourceSet is the interface for containers of resources
Scoring
Scoring is the interface for classes that contribute points to a player
SpendableResourceSet
SpendableResourceSet is a TransactionResourceSet where the resource set is going to be consumed by a player (board) This TransactionResourceSet does not include faith points as they cannot be spent.
SpendableResourceSetTest  
StrongBox
StrongBox is the class for the player board's strongbox
StrongBoxTest  
TransactionResourceSet
TransactionResourceSet is a container for all the resources (including potentially faith points) that are being moved from a resource location to another one.
